original_text: During that time of great pain, people will want to kill themselves. They will want to die, but they will not find any way to die.
korean_text: 그 날에는 사람들이 죽기를 구하여도 죽지 못하고 죽고 싶으나 죽음이 그들을 피하리로다

sentences.original_text: During that time of great pain
people will want to kill themselves
but they will not find any way to die
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 죽을 방법을 찾지 못할 것입니다
